sentences.en: A visual crescendo, if you will, in a masterpiece of sound and beauty.
sentences.cn: 你会发现这使得该件音乐和艺术杰作在视觉上达到了巅峰.

sentences.en: Characteristic is Berlioz's frequent use of the orchestral crescendo.
sentences.cn: 柏辽兹连续地使用乐队渐强,这是很有特点的.

sentences.en: Nearly two octaves below the initial pitch , the piano makes several crescendo efforts to rise again.
sentences.cn: 在比开始的基调几乎低了两个八度的地方, 钢琴以几个渐强音再次出现.

sentences.en: She spoke in a crescendo: "You are a bad girl! You are a wicked girl! You are evil!"
sentences.cn: 她嗓门越来越高地说道：“你是个坏女孩！你是个妖女！你是个魔鬼！”

sentences.en: The applause rose to a crescendo and cameras clicked.
sentences.cn: 掌声越来越响，照相机的咔嗒声不绝于耳。

sentences.en: The crescendo of noise was con-tinuous.
The curtains opened as the music reached a crescendo .
sentences.cn: 当音乐到达高潮时，大幕拉开了。

sentences.en: The music swelled to a crescendo.
The orchestra was working up to a crescendo.
sentences.cn: 交响乐团即将演奏到音量渐强的一节.

sentences.en: The shouting rose to a deafening crescendo .
sentences.cn: 喊叫声越来越响，到了震耳欲聋的强度。

sentences.en: The third line should be one crescendo.
There was a crescendo of parliamentary and press criticism.
sentences.cn: 来自议会和新闻界的批评越来越多。

sentences.en: These first two crescendo are so important.
sentences.cn: 前两个渐强是如此重要.

sentences.en: This instantly touched off an uproar which rose in a crescendo of shrill exclamations.
sentences.cn: 就听轰的一声,乱哄哄响成一片,声音越来越强,还夹着呼叫.

sentences.en: This seemed to reach a crescendo last December when voters handed him a serious indirect rebuff.
sentences.cn: 去年12月,国内对总统的批评似乎渐增—投票人给了总统一份间接的好战行为回绝书.

sentences.en: This year has seen a crescendo of attacks.
sentences.cn: 今年,攻击的声音已经渐增.

sentences.en: Voices rose in a crescendo and drowned him out.
sentences.cn: 人们讲话的声音越来越大，盖过了他的声音。
